casebody.data:
2002-1870 (La. 10/25/02)

Thomas R. HOWELL v. CAPPAERT MANUFACTURED HOUSING, INC., et al. No. 2002-CC-1870. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Howell, Thomas R.;—Plaintiff; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Rapides, 9th Judicial District Court Div. G, No. 204,054; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No. 02-0165.

Denied.

CALOGERO, C.J., would grant the writ. KNOLL, J., would grant the writ.
